title: Determine the Sample Mean
text: To find the sample standard deviation, we want to first determine the mean, from which we will measure the deviations from. The sample mean is approximately calculated by the summation of $$f m$$ (the fourth column), divided by the summation of the frequencies f (the first column).

title: Determine the Sample Mean
text: What is the approximate sample mean of the grouped data? Round to the nearest hundredth.

subHints.title: Determine the Sample Mean
subHints.text: What is $$\frac{197}{26}$$ to the nearest hundredth place?
